    @Public
public class HadoopOutputFormat<K,V>
extends HadoopOutputFormatBase<K,V,Tuple2<K,V>>
    OutputFormat implementation allowing to use Hadoop (mapreduce) OutputFormats with Flink.

    • 方法详细资料

      • writeRecord

        public void writeRecord(Tuple2<K,V> record)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Adds a record to the output.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be opened.

        参数:
        record - The records to add to the output.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the records could not be added to to an I/O problem.
